desc: 40% boost to Atk, max HP of Fire types, 120% boost to Spark damage, raises Atk parameter limits to 160000, Spark damage restores HP & adds huge boost to Spark damage of Fire types for 3 turns effect to SBB

dictionary.lore:
A Flower of the Vale tinged with Faefire. Although the original flowers were said to be delicate and fragile, the divine nature of Faefire has imbued them with a fiery essence instead of burning the bloom to ash.

During the Voidborn invasion, vast trails of destruction marked the once peaceful Vale, but one particular section was found razed with Faefireâ€”damning evidence of Man's theft and betrayal of this divine power.

name: Blaze Blossom
